nodes.text: The Eberon–Kashyyyk War was a conflict fought between the planets Kashyyyk and Eberon in the Mytaranor sector of the Mid Rim. The conflict was ended sometime between 3653 BBY and 3651 BBY by the Jedi Knight Satele Shan, who personally intervened in the war to bring it to an end.

The Eberon–Kashyyyk War was first mentioned in the 2012 reference guide Star Wars: The Old Republic Encyclopedia, under the "Major Achievements" section of Satele Shan's entry. The guide does not specify when the conflict began or who the combatants were beyond the names of the planets.
